charts.usage: kubernetes manifest service with replica set
charts.cmdt:
echo 'apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
    name: {{app_name}}
    namespace: {{namespace}}
spec:
    replicas: {{replica}}
    selector:
      matchLabels:
        app: {{app_name}}
    strategy:
        type: RollingUpdate
        rollingUpdate:
          maxSurge: 50%
          maxUnavailable: 50%
    template:
      metadata:
        labels:
          app: {{app_name}}
      spec:
        containers:
          - name: {{app_name}}
            image: {{image}}
            imagePullPolicy: "Always"
            ports:
              - containerPort: {{container_port}}
            env:
              - name: TRACE_URL
                value: "http:/hello"
            resources:
              requests:
                cpu: 0
                memory: 0
              limits:
                cpu: 256
                memory: 11400G
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
    name: {{app_name}}
    namespace: {{namespace}}
spec:
    type: LoadBalancer
    ports:
      - targetPort: {{container_port}}
        name: apihttp
        port: {{service_port}}
    selector:
      app: {{namespace}}
'  > {{app_name}}_deployment.yaml
